dialogue: I really am an intern. I'm here with my friend Emma, and–
You can't fool me that easily, spy.
Yeah. I worked it out. You're here to work out all the company secrets, aren't you? Why else would you be pretending to be an intern?
That's where your research has failed you, spy. Acuity only ever hires female interns.
Right. So my friend Emma is in with the boss, and–
If we really do have a female intern in with the boss, that should be pretty easy to prove.
I mean, you could just go...check.
Oh yeah, you'd like that, wouldn't you...SPY? Then, while I'm gone, you could steal all our kitchen secrets!
